item.title: OBS display sleep prevention fix
item.description:
OBS normally would’t allow the display to turn off. If you have a replay system running in the background and have an oled monitor, thats a very bad combo.

Run this command to disable that behaviour.

powercfg -requestsoverride process obs64.exe display system awaymode
